SECCION.ESTASSEGURO: Sure you want to log out?
SECCION.DESCRIPCIONINDEX: Register as a student to be able to choose the institution and select the course or career to which you are going to enroll. If you are an institution, you can register as one and load the available courses and careers to obtain registrations.
SECCION.DESCRIPCIONNOSOTROS:
We are a group of people who met on an academic journey and formed Saber Conectar as a virtual educational platform.
In this space we offer a service designed for the educational community: students and institutions as a whole.
Here you can find all the academic offer of the country.

Our goal is to provide a space where you can find everything you are looking for, in educational matters, in one place.
The educational institutions of the country register on our platform offering their academic offer and our users enjoy the possibility of finding all these proposals and registering for them easily and safely.
SECCION.OPC1: Semester registration to a course / career
SECCION.OPC2: Publication of a course / career per semester
SECCION.COMPLETACAMPO: Complete all the fields before making the payment.
SECCION.SUSCRENOV: Your subscription(s) will be automatically renewed each year through a single payment of
SECCION.ERROR: oops! We couldn't find the page you were looking for.
SECCION.CARRERASTEXT: Select the race that best suits you and sign up.
SECCION.CARRERSTEXT: Create, modify and delete your careers.
SECCION.CURSOSTEXT: Create, modify and delete your courses.
SECCION.TEXTSELECT: Select what you want to see
